TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit BinaryWriter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 以二進位方式將基本類型寫入資料流，並支援以特定編碼方式寫入字串。

span.span: Writes primitive types in binary to a stream and supports writing strings in a specific encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法，簡化寫入資料流的基本資料型別。The class provides methods that simplify writing primitive data types to a stream. 例如，您可以使用方法來寫入資料流做為單位元組值的布林值。For example, you can use the method to write a Boolean value to the stream as a one-byte value. 類別包含支援不同資料類型的寫入方法。The class includes write methods that support different data types. 當您建立的新執行個體類別，您提供要寫入的資料流，並選擇性地指定的編碼類型及是否要保留資料流開啟之後處置物件。When you create a new instance of the class, you provide the stream to write to, and optionally specify the type of encoding and whether to leave the stream open after disposing the object. 如果您未指定編碼類型，則會使用 utf-8。If you do not specify an encoding type, UTF-8 is used. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這個類別，以提供唯一的字元編碼的方法。A derived class can override the methods of this class to give unique character encodings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何儲存和擷取檔案中的應用程式設定。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入`Double`資料傳送到使用的記憶體並`BinaryWriter`類別頂端類別。The following code example shows how to read and write `Double` data to memory by using the and `BinaryWriter` classes on top of the class. `MemoryStream` 僅讀取和寫入`Byte`資料。`MemoryStream` only reads and writes `Byte` data. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CPP/rwdouble.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/CS/rwdouble.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWDouble/VB/rwdouble.vb#1)]

Public Overridable Sub Close ()
public: virtual void Close();
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 關閉目前 和基礎資料流。

span.span: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作`Close`呼叫方法並傳遞`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫或`Close`。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or `Close`. 設定至`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以只編碼編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元後，會影響此案例。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.

summary.span: 釋放 使用的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

summary.span: 清除目前寫入器的所有緩衝區，並造成任何緩衝資料都寫入基礎裝置。

span.span: Clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有衍生的類別應該覆寫`Flush`確保所有緩衝的資料會傳送至資料流。All derived classes should override `Flush` to ensure that all buffered data is sent to the stream. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Flush`或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or . 設定至`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以只編碼編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元後，會影響此案例。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料格式的衝突，因為不建議使用此方法搭配下列編碼方式：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-JPISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入二進位資料做為備份存放區中，使用記憶體，並確認資料已正確地寫入。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. summary.span: 將 Unicode 字元寫入至目前資料流，並按照所使用的 和寫入資料流的特定字元，將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

span.span: Writes a Unicode character to the current stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the used and the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料格式的衝突，因為不建議使用此方法搭配下列編碼方式：Because of data formatting conflicts, using this method with the following encodings is not recommended: - UTF-7UTF-7 - ISO-2022-JPISO-2022-JP - ISCIIISCII 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). Unicode surrogate 字元必須寫出做為組一起在相同的呼叫中，不會個別。Unicode surrogate characters must be written out as pairs together in the same call, not individually. 如果您需要的 surrogate 字組的支援應用程式中，請考慮使用的字元陣列和方法多載。If you require support for surrogate pairs in your application, consider using a character array and the method overload. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/CPP/rwchar.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/CS/rwchar.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChar1/VB/rwchar.vb#1)]

span.span: An I/O error occurs.
The stream is closed.
is a single surrogate character.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Write (char[] chars);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(char[] chars) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Write (chars As Char())
public: virtual void Write(cli::array <char> ^ chars);
abstract member Write : char[] -> unit override this.Write : char[] -> unit

param.name: chars
param.span: 含有要寫入之資料的字元陣列。

span.span: A character array containing the data to write.

summary.span: 將字元陣列寫入至目前資料流，並按照所使用的 和寫入資料流的特定字元，將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

span.span: Writes a character array to the current stream and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the used and the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表列出的其他一般或相關的 I/O 工作的範例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |若要執行相關作業…To do this...|請參閱這個主題中的範例…See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |建立文字檔Create a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |寫入文字檔案。Write to a text file.|[如何：將文字寫入檔案How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |從文字檔讀取。Read from a text file.|[如何：從檔案讀取文字How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |將文字附加至檔案。Append text to a file.|[如何：開啟並附加至記錄檔How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |取得檔案的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |取得檔案屬性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |設定檔案屬性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |判斷檔案是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |讀取二進位檔案。Read from a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |寫入二進位檔案。Write to a binary file.|[如何：讀取和寫入新建立的資料檔案How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1/CPP/rwchars.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1/CS/rwchars.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWChars1/VB/rwchars.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Write (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(string value) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Write (value As String)
public: virtual void Write(System::String ^ value);
abstract member Write : string -> unit override this.Write : string -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要寫入的值。

span.span: The value to write.

summary.span: 將有長度前置字元的字串以目前 的編碼方式寫入此資料流，並按照所使用的編碼方式和寫入資料流的特定字元，將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

span.span: Writes a length-prefixed string to this stream in the current encoding of the , and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the encoding used and the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長度前置詞的方法，這個方法會先寫字串的長度，以位元組為單位，以編碼時執行個體的目前編碼方式寫入資料流。Length-prefixed means that this method first writes the length of the string, in bytes, when encoded with the instance's current encoding to the stream. 此值會寫入做為不帶正負號的整數。This value is written as an unsigned integer. 然後此方法會將足夠的位元組數目寫入資料流中。This method then writes that many bytes to the stream. 比方說，"A"的字串長度為 1，但以 utf-16; 編碼寫入前置詞中的值為 2，因此，長度為 2 個位元組，而 3 個位元組會寫入資料流，包含前置詞。For example, the string "A" has a length of 1, but when encoded with UTF-16; the length is 2 bytes, so the value written in the prefix is 2, and 3 bytes are written to the stream, including the prefix. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何儲存和擷取檔案中的應用程式設定。The following code example demonstrates how to store and retrieve application settings in a file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An I/O error occurs.

span.span: Writes an eight-byte unsigned integer to the current stream and advances the stream position by eight bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `BinaryWriter` 儲存此資料型別中 little endian 格式。`BinaryWriter` stores this data type in little endian format. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

span.span: An I/O error occurs.
The stream is closed.

summary.span: 將一個區域的位元組陣列寫入目前資料流。

span.span: Writes a region of a byte array to the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入二進位資料做為備份存放區中，使用記憶體，並確認資料已正確地寫入。The following code example shows how to write binary data using memory as a backing store, and then verify that the data was written correctly. [!code-csharp[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2/CS/rwreadbytes.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BinaryReaderWriter.RWBytes2/VB/rwreadbytes.vb#1)]

param.span: 要寫入的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters to write.

summary.span: 將字元陣列中的一區段寫入至目前的資料流，並按照所使用的 和可能為寫入資料流的特定字元，將資料流中目前的位置往前移。

span.span: Writes a section of a character array to the current stream, and advances the current position of the stream in accordance with the used and perhaps the specific characters being written to the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取及寫入使用記憶體做為備份存放區的資料。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. MemberSignature.Value: protected void Write7BitEncodedInt (int value);
.method familyhidebysig instance void Write7BitEncodedInt(int32 value) cil managed
Protected Sub Write7BitEncodedInt (value As Integer)
protected: void Write7BitEncodedInt(int value);
member this.Write7BitEncodedInt : int -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要寫入的 32 位元整數。

span.span: The 32-bit integer to be written.

summary.span: 以壓縮格式寫入 32 位元整數。

span.span: Writes a 32-bit integer in a compressed format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整數`value`參數會寫出七個位元，一次開始的七個的最小顯著性位元。The integer of the `value` parameter is written out seven bits at a time, starting with the seven least-significant bits. 高位元的位元組會指出是否有更多之後，這個可寫入的位元組。The high bit of a byte indicates whether there are more bytes to be written after this one. 如果`value`可容納七個位元，它會採用只有一個位元組的空間。If `value` will fit in seven bits, it takes only one byte of space. 如果`value`所無法容納七個位元，高的位元設定的第一個位元組並寫出。`value`然後移位七個位元和下一個位元組會寫入。If `value` will not fit in seven bits, the high bit is set on the first byte and written out. `value` is then shifted by seven bits and the next byte is written. 此程序會重複，直到已寫入整個的整數。This process is repeated until the entire integer has been written. 如需一般 I/O 工作的清單，請參閱 < [ 一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).

span.span: The end of the stream is reached.
The stream is closed.
The stream is closed.
